name: Affectation-ui
tagline: Assign tasks to workers using a map
body:
### Affectation UI

This example app demonstrates Leaflet integration in an Angular application
and bidirectional cooperation between list and map.

Given a list of workers and of tasks, and the map coordinates of each,
the purpose of this app is to graphically assign tasks to workers.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
